parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns if the given vehicle is still able to move.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>
* This command does not check for the amount of fuel the vehicle has, except for helicopters and airplanes.
* A helicopter with a damaged tail rotor may return that it cannot move, where a skilled pilot could use it.
</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[canMove]] unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if the vehicle is able to move, [[false]] if not

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[not]] [[canMove]] _tank) [[then]]
{
	[[player]] [[sideChat]] "He's nailed on the ground! Now hurry!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[canFire]], [[canStand]]
</value></part></template>
